Interface SpectateResponse<SI extends SpectatorInventory<?>>

Type Parameters:
SI - the type of SpectatorInventory
public interface SpectateResponse<SI extends SpectatorInventory<?>>
A SpectateResponse can either be successful, or not. If a SpectateResponse is successful, isSuccess() returns true and getInventory() returns a SpectatorInventory normally.
See Also:
  • SpectateResponse on the InvSee++ wiki
  • OpenResponse

    • isSuccess

      boolean isSuccess()
      Get whether this response was successful.
      Returns:
      true if this response is successful, otherwise false

    • getInventory

      Returns:
      the spectator inventory
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if this response is not successful

    • getReason

      NotCreatedReason getReason() throws NoSuchElementException
      Get the reason why the spectator inventory could not be created.
      Returns:
      the reason
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if this response is successful

    • fromOptional

      static <SI extends SpectatorInventory<?>> SpectateResponse<SI> fromOptional(Optional<SI> optional, NotCreatedReason ifEmpty)
      Convert an Optional into a SpectateResponse.
      Parameters:
      optional - the optional value used for success
      ifEmpty - the reason used to fail the SpectateReponse if the optional Optional.isEmpty()
      Returns:
      a new SpectateResponse

    • fromOptional

      static <SI extends SpectatorInventory<?>> SpectateResponse<SI> fromOptional(Optional<SI> optional)
      Convert an Optional into a SpectateResponse.

    • toOptional

      static <SI extends SpectatorInventory<?>> Optional<SI> toOptional(SpectateResponse<SI> response)
      Convert a SpectateResponse into an Optional. The optional will have a value present if the spectate response is successful. If the spectate response is not successful, then the returned optional will be empty.
      Parameters:
      response - the SpectateResponse
      Returns:
      the optional
